attributes.action: To protect children agaist child abuse............
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are calling upon the goverment to take action now .In light of what has just happened to baby p and many other deaths from child abuse.It comes to late to say sorry it will never ever take away the pain and sad ending of baby p death and many others of child abuse,We want safety actions put in place now,or are we going to read another sad and appalling case like baby p and many others deaths from child abuse.............

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
